LFADS.PosteriorMeans¶

classLFADS.PosteriorMeans(pms, params, seq)[source]¶

Wrapper around loaded posterior mean sampling data performed on a trained LFADS model

Properties

time = None[source]¶

nTime x 1 vector of times in ms for each of the timeseries below

controller_outputs = None[source]¶

nControllerOutputs x T x nTrials controller outputs to generator inputs

factors = None[source]¶

nFactors x T x nTrials factor trajectories

generator_ics = None[source]¶

nGeneratorUnits x nTrials` generator initial conditions

generator_states = None[source]¶

nGeneratorUnits x T x nTrials

rates = None[source]¶

nNeurons x T x nTrials

validInds = None[source]¶

list of validation trial indices

trainInds = None[source]¶

list of training trial indices

params = None[source]¶

LFADS.RunParams instance

Dependent Properties

DependentisValid = None[source]¶

contains valid, loaded data, false means empty

DependentnControllerOutputs = None[source]¶
DependentnGeneratorUnits = None[source]¶

number of units in the generator RNN

DependentnFactors = None[source]¶

number of output factors

DependentnNeurons = None[source]¶

number of actual neurons as provided in the training and validation datasets

DependentT = None[source]¶

number of timepoints

DependentnTrials = None[source]¶

Methods

[pm] = PosteriorMeans(pms, params, seq)[source]¶

Construct instance by copying struct fields

Parameters:
  • pms (struct) – Posterior mean struct loaded from disk
  • params (LFADS.RunParams) – Run parameters
  • time (vector) – time vector for all timeseries

Methods

[avg] = getConditionAveragedFieldValues(field, conditionIds)[source]¶

Using the conditionId values, average over trials (the last dim) within each condition for a particular field in this class.

Parameters:
  • field (string) – name of field in LFADS.PosteriorMeans class
  • conditionIds (vector) – condition labels with size nTrials x 1. The results of unique(conditionIds) will determine the ordering of the conditions within avg
Returns:

avg – Averaged values, will have same size as the corresponding field in PosteriorMeans, except the last dim’s size will be nConditions == numel(unique(conditionIds)) rather than nTrials.
Return type:

numeric
